name: DotNetCoreCLI
description: Build, test and publish using dotnet core command-line.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: command
inputs.label: Command
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select or type a dotnet command

inputs.name: publishWebProjects
inputs.label: Publish Web Projects
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true, the task will try to find the web projects in the repository and run the publish command on them. Web projects are identified by presence of either a web.config file or wwwroot folder in the directory.

inputs.name: projects
inputs.label: Project(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path of the project.json file(s) from repo root. Wildcards can be used. For example, **/project.json for all project.json files in all the sub folders.

inputs.name: arguments
inputs.label: Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Arguments to the selected command. For example, build configuration, output folder, rutime. The arguments depend on the command selected.

inputs.name: zipAfterPublish
inputs.label: Zip Published Projects
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true, folder created by the publish command will be zipped.

messages.noProjectFilesFound: Project file(s) matching the specified pattern were not found.
messages.noWebProjctFound: No web project was found in the repository. Web projects are identified by presence of either a web.config file or wwwroot folder in the directory.
messages.dotnetCommandFailed: Dotnet command failed with non-zero exit code: %d.
messages.noPublishFolderFoundToZip: A publish folder could not be found to zip for project file: %s.
